name: Langdock
headline: The all-in-one AI platform for companies.
description: Langdock is a comprehensive and secure platform for deploying AI in companies. From a powerful chat interface for all employees to tools for creating custom workflow automations with AI-driven agents.

founders.name: Tobias Kemkes, Founder
founders.description: Before Langdock, I was the founding engineer at Blair (YC S19) and built an end-to-end automated servicing platform to manage their $100M debt facility. The platform was audited, handled sensitive data, and moved millions of dollars around. I later became Blair's first head of product, managing a team of five engineers.

Your AI Operating System
# The all-in-one AI platform for your company.
Langdock is the enterprise-ready platform to roll out AI to all of your employees. Plus, enabling your developers to build and deploy the most custom AI workflows.
[Get started - it's free](https://langdock.com/<https:/app.langdock.com/signup>)
7-day free trial.
[Talk to sales](https://langdock.com/</talk-to-sales>)
#### Chat
Powerful AI chat.
#### Assistants
Use-case specific AI.
#### Search
New
AI-workplace search.
#### API
All models, one API.
#### Agents
Beta
Build & run agents.
#### Security
Enterprise trusted.

##### The platform
## One platform. Two audiences.
Langdock is the enterprise-ready solution for rolling out AI to all of your employees while enabling your developers to build and deploy custom AI workflows on top.
#### For everyone in the company
Roll out powerful AI chat and use-case-specific assistants to everyone in the company. Model-agnostic and data privacy compliant.
#### Products
#### Chat
Powerful AI chat.
#### Assistants
Use-case specific AI.
#### Search
New
AI-workplace search.
Chat
How can I speed up the design phase of my engineering project?
![Max](https://langdock.com/models/openai.svg)
To speed up the design phase of Project Caroso, consider using CAD software to create templates for standard components.
#### For your developers
Build your custom AI workflows and applications, distribute them to everyone in the company, and measure their impact.
#### Products
#### Agents
Beta
Build & run agents.
#### API
All models, one API.
Agents

##### Enterprise
### Built to match every scale - and every security requirement.
We built robust processes to keep your data safe, your workspace private, and your information accurate.
[Learn more ](https://langdock.com/</security>)
![security](https://langdock.com/security-bg.svg)
![security](https://langdock.com/iso-logo.svg)
![security](https://langdock.com/gdpr-logo.svg)
![security](https://langdock.com/soc2-logo.svg)
#### Security and Compliance
Security is our core commitment, not an afterthought.
![europe](https://langdock.com/_next/image?url=%2Feurope.png&w=3840&q=75)
#### Hosted in Europe
The Langdock platform is hosted in Europe - as well as most available models.
![security](https://langdock.com/security-bg.svg)
![security](https://langdock.com/azure.svg)
![security](https://langdock.com/gcloud.svg)
![security](https://langdock.com/aws.svg)
#### Dedicated Deployment
Maintain full data regency by hosting Langdock in your own cloud or data center.
##### Education
### We'll help you and your team get started
Browse our prompt engineering guide, documentation and educational videos to find what you need.
[![promptEngineeringGuide](https://langdock.com/articles/prompt-engineering.svg)Prompt Engineering GuideMaster the art of crafting precise and impactful prompts with our in-depth Prompt Engineering Guide.Learn more](https://langdock.com/<https:/docs.langdock.com/prompt-engineering/introduction>)
[![documentation](https://langdock.com/articles/documentation.svg)DocumentationAccess our extensive documentation, designed to support you in navigating and utilizing Langdock's features to their fullest potential.Learn more](https://langdock.com/<https:/docs.langdock.com/>)
[![slackAndTeamsIntegration](https://langdock.com/articles/slack-teams.svg)Slack and Teams IntegrationLangdock Chat and Assistants integrates natively with Slack and Microsoft Teams (coming soon). Learn how to install and roll it out to your employees.Learn more](https://langdock.com/<https:/docs.langdock.com/product/slack-bot>)

generated_description:
Langdock is an ambitious startup that emerged from the Y Combinator Batch S23 in 2023, launching with a clear mission: to serve as a comprehensive AI platform for companies. Based in Berlin, Germany, Langdock has quickly assembled a team of 10 dedicated employees under the guidance of Aaron Epstein as their Group Partner.

At its core, Langdock positions itself as an enterprise-ready solution that allows businesses to deploy AI across all levels of their organization. Its offerings include a robust AI chat interface, specialized assistants for various use-cases, an AI-driven workplace search feature, and the ability to create custom workflow automations. This flexibility ensures that users can tap into the power of AI—regardless of their specific needs or data privacy concerns.

What’s particularly compelling about Langdock is its model-agnostic approach, allowing companies to use various AI models from different providers without being locked into a single solution. This not only adds a layer of freedom for developers building custom applications but also promotes a scalable architecture that can grow according to the company's demands.

Currently, Langdock is trusted by over 250 companies, illustrating its effectiveness and the tangible impact of its platform. With features like AI chat capabilities, dedicated assistants for tasks such as sales enablement, HR inquiries, and customer support, organizations can enhance productivity while maintaining data privacy compliance.

Langdock’s commitment to security is evident as it adheres to stringent regulations, being GDPR-compliant and ISO 27001 & SOC 2 TYPE II certified. It's hosted in Europe, ensuring robust data governance and compliance with local regulations.

For organizations interested in dipping their toes into the AI revolution, Langdock offers a 7-day free trial that allows potential customers to explore the platform’s full suite of functionalities. This makes it easy for businesses to see firsthand how AI can transform their workflows and improve overall efficiency.

In summary, Langdock is not just another tech startup; it's a comprehensive AI platform designed with the enterprise in mind. From dynamic customer support systems to custom workflow automations, Langdock is shaping how companies can leverage AI to drive productivity and innovation. If you're looking to integrate AI into your organization without the hassles of complicated implementations, Langdock is certainly worth a look. 

For more information, check out their website: [Langdock](https://langdock.com).
